title: woRldnews::News Headlines using R
text: section, want introduce interactive user interface user can use run application. run shiny app create window user’s preferred browser ask user select parameters news search. Based parameters, application search news headlines display tabular format. data table, user can see news title, news description, published date, news url image associated news. click news link, directly take user original website news published.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Alex Cleveringa. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Cleveringa (2022). woRldnews: Finds Top News Headlines World. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://eshitazaman.github.io/stat585-project/.

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: woRldnews can installed devtools get recent production version GitHub:
code: #install.packages('devtools') # if devtools is not already installed #devtools::install_github('eshitazaman/stat585-project')

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: Welcome woRldnews! can search news articles R, ’ll need create free account [Newsapi.org] (https://newsapi.org) acquire apikey using “get_apikey” function. Newsapi assign apikey. can save apikey .Renviron file future use. “save_apikey” function creates project .Renviron file save apikey .

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: relevant searches, use runshiny function: run function, ’ll receive shiny widget : Search box user selects, “Top-headlines”, see interface following: Search box Choose “articles” “top headlines” first box determine sort search wish conduct. choose “Manually” “.Renviron” second box enter apikey. want search articles, enter term, choose language, sort . can limit search certain dates last 30 days. receive search results table format 20 articles including title, description, content, url, author publication date. want search headlines, enter country, choose country. receive search results table format 20 top headlines including title, description, content, url, author publication date. clicking url can access related websites. Search box sample search results top-headlines sports USA. Search box sample search results articles keyword “tesla” time period last 30 days.

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: details, see vignette.

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: Newsapi.org basic, easy--use REST API offers JSON search results current historical news stories 80,000 sources throughout world.
